ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I strengthened my reading, writing, speaking, and listening skills in Portuguese. I also learned a lot about culture, including music and short stories in Brazil.

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: The professor is very dedicated and makes every class an interactive and fun learning experience. The music, short stories, and activities in class helped students learn grammar more effectively, while also improving their overall language skills.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: This class was a really enjoyable experience. The professor was very dedicated and wanted students to learn. We often learned grammar through music, short stories, games, and other activities in class. We spoke Portuguese every class, and I feel that my speaking ability has really improved.
Absolutely. Great way to learn about language and culture
